title: EE60070: Fluidic Instrumentation And Control - Quick Facts
text:
EE60070
Course name | FLUIDIC INSTRUMENTATION AND CONTROL
Offered by | Electrical Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Mechanical Compensators: Circuit analogy, Gears, Gyroscopes. Fluid Power System: Fluid flow equation. Laminar, turbulent flow. Resistance, capacitance, inertance. Electrical analogy. Liquid level systems. Pneumatic systems dynamics. Fluid power components: Pumps, Motors, Valves. Nonlinearities in valves. Dynamic analysis. Fluid logic systems using valves. Amplifiers. Hydraulic servo motor. Standard symbols. Fluid control systems: Valve positions. Servo. Hydraulic, Electrical feedback. Valve-motor position servo. Tachometer feedback. Lag lead networks using mechanicalhydraulic components. Pneumatic nozzle flapper system. Pneumatic relay. Pneumatic controllers. Fluidics: Coanda effect. Jet interaction fludic devices. Vortex valves. Impact. Modulator. Turbulance amplifier. Fludic logic systems.Industrial fluid circuits: Safety circuits. Circuit design. case studies.
